title: Pid 1.2 [Multi6]
description:
DESCRIPTION:
A young boy named Kurt finds himself stranded on a peculiar planet, and he must find his way home. Finding help from unlikely allies and the curious tools in his backpack, Kurt must use gravity-defying beams to conquer every platform and solve every puzzle on this strange journey. Featuring over 12 hours of action-adventure gameplay and fully-realized co-op, players are poised to experience a beautiful world set to an evocative soundtrack. With twenty-two different locations, dozens of foes and hundreds of secrets, Pid is like your worldÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ only different. 

Languages:
Russian, English; 
French, Italian, German, Spanish (available in game menu)


Installation instructions:
1. Execute the installation file.
2. Install the game.
3. Enjoy.
